title: Patrick Mahomes Signs the Richest Deal in NFL History | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We break down the news of Patrick Mahomes signing a 10-year extension with the Kansas City Chiefs worth $503 million. We assess the value of Mahomes, the ripple effect this deal might have throughout the league, and whether or not this deal could backfire.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Nora Princiotti
